to unlock the information within！

qteGuide3: Congratulations, you have reinforced the mast!
qteGuide4: The battle horns have just sounded, good luck!

A mysterious force

wants to save you from the storm.

rainAndWind: A raging storm is approaching! Now——
rainAndWindAction: Race against time to defend the boat
ruleTxt:
Event Period

Event Duration: 2021/07/13 – 2021/07/20 23:59 (UTC+8)

Let's set sail to parts unknown together!

Event Description

Uncover a nautical manual of unknown origin and embark on a mysterious voyage with your trusty companion, Paimon!

=Set Sail=

Click the "Set Sail" button to start your voyage.

=Areas=

The nautical map shows the areas that you have already explored. Various choices made by you during the voyage will affect the route taken.

Every time you make a choice in an unexplored area or successfully defend your boat, you can unlock the current area.

=Energy=

Unlocking a new area requires Energy. Unlocking each new area consumes 10 Energy points.

Energy can be obtained by completing the tasks of the Energy Station.

=Violent Storms Incoming, Defend Your Boat=

Heavy rain, lightning, and huge waves incoming! Protect your boat!

In defense challenges, an operation is considered successful if Travelers press the circular icon at the right time. Defense challenges are deemed successful when the number of successfully activated icons is 50% or more.

If the current area is an area yet to be unlocked, the current area can be unlocked after the defense challenge is successful, and 10 Energy points will be consumed. Repeating a challenge in an unlocked area will not consume energy.

If the defense challenge ends in failure, the current area will not be unlocked and 10 Energy points will be consumed. Share a commemorative picture of this challenge failure to obtain 10 Energy points and continue your challenge. (This Energy acquisition opportunity only exists once a day, across all defense challenges.)

=Voyage Packets=

During the voyage, you might come across some "information fragments" that are difficult to decipher.

A certain number of information fragments can be pieced together to complete the information! In the nautical manual, you can view the information you have collected.

*Some information is more complicated and has to be unlocked through puzzles.

=Seafarer's Album=

The memorable moments of your voyage will be captured and saved into your album.

During your voyage, you will obtain commemorative photos that will be saved in the "Seafarer's Album" page of your Nautical Manual, and you can revisit them at any time.

Event Rules

1. Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can participate in this event.

2. During the event, complete Energy Supply Tasks to replenish energy. Upon completing the mission, energy will automatically be added (you do not need to collect it manually).

*Energy Supply Tasks will refresh every day at 00:00 (Server Time).

3. Each time you unlock new information, you will receive a reward of Mora. Mora will be sent directly to your in-game mail (there may be a delay of approximately 10 minutes before you receive the mail).

4. When you unlock 8/15/25/35 areas, you can claim the corresponding rewards in the progress pop-up window. You can open the window to see your progress thus far.

The rewards will be sent directly to your in-game mail (there may be a delay of approximately 10 minutes before you receive the mail).

5. Obtain 10,000 Mora when you share the event for the first time.

*Once the event is over, the unlocked information and progress rewards on the event page will not be available for claiming.

=Claiming Rewards=

*Sakura Mochi and Tricolor Dango will be delivered to Travelers' in-game mailbox within three days of the Version 2.0 update.

The in-game mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim your rewards in time.

*You will still be able to access the event page and play for a period of time after the event is over. However, the second and third Energy Supply Tasks will no longer be accessible and you will no longer be able to claim in-game rewards.
shareEndDesc: I unlocked the Seafarer's Album from the "Mysterious Voyage" in the Genshin Impact event! Come with me on my journey~
shareIntelligenceDesc: I unlocked information about "Mysterious Voyage" in the Genshin Impact event! Come with me on my journey~
shareQteFailDesc: The Genshin Impact event, "Mysterious Voyage" is available for a limited time. The ocean is full of peril, help me get a chance to sail!
shareQteSuccessDesc: The Genshin Impact event, "Mysterious Voyage" is available for a limited time. Let's set sail to unpredictable seas together!
socialShareDesc: The Genshin Impact event, "Mysterious Voyage" is available for a limited time. Navigate uncharted waters and obtain Primogems as rewards.
socialShareShortDesc: The "Mysterious Voyage" event is available for a limited time! Set sail to parts unknown!
toOpenLockTip: Drag or rotate the fragments to piece them into the correct pattern to unlock information!
webGlErrorTxt: The current device does not support this event, please change to another device and try again.
